answers.answer: Hi,If all orthopedic and dermatologic causes have been ruled out, what comes to my mind, is a form of nerve injury caused by prolonged diabetes. This is called as diabetic neuropathy.This may result from prolonged untreated diabetes mellitus leading to a raised blood sugar level. This is partly treatable using some drugs and blood sugar controi.However, this diagnosis must be established by means of definite exams.Hope this helped.best regards
